about_the_game:
Battle bulls, bats, behemoths, and all-around baddies with the Pixel Battlers Monsters Pack 2! ELV Games is back with another set of front view pixel art battlers, sized for Ace and MV/MZ, for your heroes to face in combat! 36 different monsters are ready to turn any map into a creature-filled dungeon.

Each monster also comes in 4 different colors, bringing the pack total to 144 battlers! If your game has been needing some more creatures and critters to keep battles interesting or if you want to add upgradable enemies to your ever-evolving dungeons, check out the Pixel Battlers Monsters Pack 2!


Contents:

- RPG Monsters for your game!
- 36 Unique Monsters!
- 4 Variations of each monster!
- 144 Total Monsters!
- 64x64 Pixelart sprites!
- Scaled perfectly for RPG Maker!


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
